short_summary: Bulk Supply of Accommodation to Borrego Springs
description: The purpose of this RFP is to provide accommodation to DND employees in the Borrego Springs area.
full_summary:
# Accommodations Tender for Borrego Springs, California
## Solicitation Information
### Solicitation Reference Number
* PW-_KIN-555-8726

### Solicitation Number
* W6399-23DB26/A

### Publication Date
* 2023-01-23

### Tender Closing Date
* 2023-02-03T14:00:00

### Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Procurement Information
### Procurement Category
* SRV

### Procurement Method
* Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Selection Criteria
* Lowest Price

### Delivery Location
* Foreign (Borrego Springs, California)

## Contracting Entity
### Contracting Entity Name
* Public Works and Government Services Canada

### Contracting Entity Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## End-User Entity
### End-User Entity Name
* Department of National Defence

### End-User Entity Address
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide accommodations in the Borrego Springs, California area from March 5 to 28, 2023. The contractor is required to provide 36 double occupancy rooms for the specified timeframe.

## Contact Information
* Contact Person: Sean Webster
* Email: Sean.webster@pwgsc.gc.ca
* Telephone: (873) 354-9545
* Fax: (613) 545-8067

Note: All documents may be submitted in either English or French, the two official languages of Canada.
